mapper.select:
select * from emp e left join id_type idtype on e.typeid = idtype.typeid left join education edu on e.eduid = edu.eduid left join dept d on e.deptid = d.deptid left join emp_type et on e.emptypeid = et.emptypeid left join position p on e.poid = p.poid
where empid = #{empid}
mapper.delete: delete from emp where empid in (${str})
